trans-unit.source: How to: display milliseconds in date and time values
trans-unit.target: 如何：显示日期和时间值中的毫秒

trans-unit.source: How to display milliseconds in date and time values
trans-unit.target: 如何显示日期和时间值中的毫秒

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: How to: display milliseconds in date and time values
trans-unit.target: 如何：显示日期和时间值中的毫秒

trans-unit.source: The default date and time formatting methods, such as [DateTime.ToString()](xref:System.DateTime.ToString), include the hours, minutes, and seconds of a time value but exclude its milliseconds component.
trans-unit.target: 默认日期和时间格式设置方法（如 [DateTime.ToString()](xref:System.DateTime.ToString)）包含时间值的小时、分钟和秒，但不包含其毫秒部分。

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to include a date and time's millisecond component in formatted date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 本主题说明如何在格式化日期和时间字符串中包含日期和时间的毫秒部分。

trans-unit.source: To display the millisecond component of a DateTime value
trans-unit.target: 显示的 DateTime 值的毫秒部分

trans-unit.source: If you are working with the string representation of a date, convert it to a [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) or a [DateTimeOffset](xref:System.DateTimeOffset) value by using the static [DateTime.Parse(String)](xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String)) or [DateTimeOffset.Parse(String)](xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse(System.String)) method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用日期的字符串表示形式，请使用使用静态 [DateTime.Parse(String)](xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String)) 或 [DateTimeOffset.Parse(String)](xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse(System.String)) 方法将它转换为 [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) 或 [DateTimeOffset](xref:System.DateTimeOffset) 值。

trans-unit.source: To extract the string representation of a time's millisecond component, call the date and time value's [DateTime.ToString(String)](xref:System.DateTime.ToString(System.String)) or [DateTimeOffset.ToString](xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.String)) method, and pass the `fff` or `FFF` custom format pattern either alone or with other custom format specifiers as the format parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要提取时间毫秒部分的字符串表示形式，请调用日期和时间值的 [DateTime.ToString(String)](xref:System.DateTime.ToString(System.String)) 或 [DateTimeOffset.ToString](xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.String)) 方法，并将 `fff` 或 `FFF` 自定义格式模式单独传递，或与其他自定义格式说明符作为格式参数一起传递。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The example displays the millisecond component of a [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) and a [DateTimeOffset](xref:System.DateTimeOffset) value to the console, both alone and included in a longer date and time string.
trans-unit.target: 该示例向控制台显示 [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) 和 [DateTimeOffset](xref:System.DateTimeOffset) 值的毫秒部分（单独以及包含在较长的日期和时间字符串中）。

trans-unit.source: The `fff` format pattern includes any trailing zeros in the millisecond value.
trans-unit.target: `fff` 格式模式包含毫秒值中的任何尾随零。

trans-unit.source: The `FFF` format pattern suppresses them.
trans-unit.target: `FFF` 格式模式禁止显示它们。

trans-unit.source: The difference is illustrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了差异。

trans-unit.source: A problem with defining a complete custom format specifier that includes the millisecond component of a date and time is that it defines a hard-coded format that may not correspond to the arrangement of time elements in the application's current culture.
trans-unit.target: 与定义包含日期和时间的毫秒部分的完整自定义格式说明符有关的一个问题在于，它定义可能与应用程序当前区域性中的时间元素排列不对应的硬编码格式。

trans-unit.source: A better alternative is to retrieve one of the date and time display patterns defined by the current culture's [DateTimeFormatInfo](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo) object and modify it to include milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个更好的替代方法是检索当前区域性的 [DateTimeFormatInfo](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo) 对象定义的日期和时间显示模式之一，并修改它以包含毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates this approach.
trans-unit.target: 该示例也阐释了这种方法。

trans-unit.source: It retrieves the current culture's full date and time pattern from the [DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern) property, and then inserts the custom pattern `.ffff` after its seconds pattern.
trans-unit.target: 它会从 [DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern) 属性检索当前区域性的完整日期和时间模式，然后在其秒模式后面插入自定义模式 `.ffff`。

trans-unit.source: Note that the example uses a regular expression to perform this operation in a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该示例使用正则表达式在单个方法调用中执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a custom format specifier to display a fractional part of seconds other than milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用自定义格式说明符来显示毫秒之外的秒的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `f` or `F` custom format specifier displays tenths of a second, the `ff` or `FF` custom format specifier displays hundredths of a second, and the `ffff` or `FFFF` custom format specifier displays ten thousandths of a second.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`f` 或 `F` 自定义格式说明符显示十分之几秒，`ff` 或 `FF` 自定义格式说明符显示百分之几秒，`ffff` 或 `FFFF` 自定义格式说明符显示万分之几秒。

trans-unit.source: Fractional parts of a millisecond are truncated instead of rounded in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 毫秒的小数部分在返回的字符串中会进行截断而不是舍入。

trans-unit.source: These format specifiers are used in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例中使用了这些格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to display very small fractional units of a second, such as ten thousandths of a second or hundred-thousandths of a second.
trans-unit.target: 可以显示秒的非常小的小数单位，如万分之几秒或十万分之几秒。

trans-unit.source: However, these values may not be meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些值可能没有意义。

trans-unit.source: The precision of date and time values depends on the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间值的精度取决于系统时钟的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo)
trans-unit.target: [System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo](xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo)

trans-unit.source: [Custom date and time format strings](custom-datetime.md)
trans-unit.target: [自定义日期和时间格式字符串](custom-datetime.md)
